The Oblitercons/Nemesis Enforcer/Stinkbomb:

::Dark One fell back, hitting a tree, firing off a dozen rounds of explosive 
bullets at Shredder's abdomen, the clip in his sub-machine gun sliding out 
automatically as it ran out of energy, Dark One quickly replacing the clip::

::Pyro transformed to his beast mode, a black dragon::
::Turning his weight towards Shredder, he fired a burst of flames at the 
Predacon::

::Hiss  fired off a few fuisons blasts at Quickstrike, then a few at a tree, 
staring a fire, already adding onto Pyro's flames, an old fashioned forest 
fire beginning::

::The Oblitercons began to retreat, Breakdown providing heavy cover fire with 
his grenade launcher::
